Title: Lawless
Writer: Nick Cave (screenplay by), Matt Bondurant (based on the book by: "The Wettest County in the World")
Actors: Shia LaBeouf, Tom Hardy, Jason Clarke, Guy Pearce
Plot: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a trio of bootlegging brothers are threatened by a new special deputy and other authorities angling for a cut of their profits.
Production: Annapurna Pictures, Blumhansonallen Films, Douglas Wick/Lucy Fisher
